description: Ensure text spacing can be adjusted without loss of content.
recommendation: Avoid locking line height or spacing values that prevent user overrides. (WCAG 2.1 SC 1.4.12)
algorithm: Flags !important spacing overrides (line-height/letter-spacing/word-spacing) and white-space: nowrap rules.
algorithm_advanced: Flags !important line-height/letter-spacing/word-spacing overrides and white-space:nowrap rules.
